summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1185, for the improvement of East Harrison Street, in the City of Seattle, from Eastlake Avenue to the alley west of Bellevue Avenue North by constructing concrete sidewalks and stairways under Ordinance No. 13156 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
